        public String save()

      • saveTemporary

        public void saveTemporary()
        Saves the current approval profile to a temporary variable managed by this bean. Should be used to save the current state before the UI is refreshed. This prevents data entry in UI controls to be discarded, causing poor user experience. To permanently save the approval profile, see save(). In comparison, this method does not require any authorisation, and will not throw any exceptions, nor show any error messages to the user.

      • cancel

        public String cancel()

      • addField

        public String addField​(int partitionId)
        Adds the currently selected field to the partition specified by the parameter. The step that the partition resides in is retrieved from the steps class member.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the ID of the partition to add the field to
        Returns:
        an empty string to keep the scope.

      • addRowToRadioButton

        public String addRowToRadioButton​(int partitionId,
                                  String label)
        A special method for adding rows to radio button arrays. The ID of the partition is required, but the step identity and the radio button field identity can be derived from class members.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the ID of the partition that the radio button resides in
        label - the label for the new row
        Returns:
        an empty string to keep the scope.

      • removeRowFromRadioButton

        public String removeRowFromRadioButton​(int partitionId,
                                       String encodedRadioButton)
        Similar to the above, the below method removes a row from a radio button array.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the ID of the partition that the radio button resides in
        encodedRadioButton - the encoded radio button
        Returns:
        an empty string to keep the scope.
